commit_message: Always append slash after Postgres db endpoint (#209)

issues.title: Always append slash after Postgres db endpoint
issues.body:
*Issue #, if available:* Fixes #208

*Description of changes:*

[Postgres docs](https://jdbc.postgresql.org/documentation/use/#connecting-to-the-database) on the matter.
